dcterms:creator: D. J. Butler
J. Wulff
G. B. Stanley
M. J. Black
dcterms:description: The MPI Sintel dataset consists of complex computer graphics sequences. It was constructed for thorough evaluation of optical flow techniques, but has also been used for evaluating other low-level vision algorithms.
dcterms:title: MPI Sintel

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset provides sparse ground-truth depth measurements acquired by a LiDAR scanner, used for quantitative evaluation of monocular depth estimation.
dcterms:title: KITTI
